scripts.setup-db: npx wrangler d1 execute D1_TODOS_DB --local --command 'CREATE TABLE if not exists TODOS (id CHAR PRIMARY KEY, text CHAR, completed CHAR, sessionId CHAR, date CHAR);' --persist-to ./.mf
scripts.deploy: CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=8ed4d03ac99f77561d0e8c9cbcc76cb6 npx wrangler pages publish ./dist/public --branch main --project-name d1-todos-solid-start
